Literature.Title: Effect of Secondary Structure and Side Chain Length of Hydrophobic Amino Acid Residues on the Antimicrobial Activity and Toxicity of 14-Residue-Long de novo AMPs.
Literature.Author: Pandit G, Chowdhury N, Abdul Mohid S, Bidkar AP, Bhunia A, Chatterjee S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=15µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=15µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>100µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi TY2(MIC=100µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>100µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=50µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=5µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=>100µM),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=5µM),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=>100µM)
